name: Backdoor Shifts
description:
👋 Hey there, magician! Are you ready for an adventure? 👋  Yeeeey! 😄 This will be so much fun!  You have been selected to take care of your favourite friends while our dear janitor is on holiday. Don’t worry about this, as it will only be for 1 day, and you won’t do it for free!

 If you do your job right, you will receive a lot of sweet and delicious candies! How many?  Well, how many you can carry with you back home to your mom!

  Alright, all you gotta do is to make sure the friends are fine.😶  Like, keep them away from getting scratched, guard them against any unwanted visitors, blah, blah, blah...  🙄Oh, Yeah! And make sure they stay in their hats. Don’t worry if they suddenly rise from their place, they just enjoy seeing your beautiful face! 

Are you ready for your first shift? 🍬

- Mr Kapoor

Game Type & Genre
Type: Horror

Length: Short ( about 20-30minutes)

Controls:
Press Click to push the friends back into their hats
